title: The Joy of Christmas: A 3-in-1 Collection
description: Christmas stories to warm your heatThe Christmas stories of beloved author Melody Carlson have sold more than 350,000 copies. Now you can enjoy three of these popular novels in one value-priced volume. Each story highlights the things you adore about Christmastime--family, love, commitment, forgiveness, and gratitude.Perfect as a gift--to a loved one or yourself--The Joy of Christmas includes An Irish Christmas, All I Have to Give, and The Christmas Dog.
author: Melody Carlson
